page.title: 11 THE GAMEKEEPERS
page.content: There are two gamekeepers employed in the village of{Marshchapel}. They are responsible for the breeding and rearing of wild fowl ie. Pheasants and Partridges. They are also responsible for the control of vermin .During the year,they raise hundreds of Pheasants and large numbers of Partridges. In the Autumn time after harvest,shoots are organised by local farmers, and many brace of Pheasants are shot.One of the other duties is to keep down the number of rabbits, foxes, crows and pigeons.
